markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6097) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=676" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 153 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
bloodline that grants primal spells

</column>

---

You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest rank, which you can use only to cast [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1694) or [_summon plant or fungus_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1705). You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if they aren't in your spell repertoire.

<title level="2">Primal Evolution leads to...</title>
[Greater Physical Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6112), [Greater Vital Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6120)
name: Primal Evolution
